author: trawick
msg: Linux 2.4+: If Apache is started as root and you code
CoreDumpDirectory, coredumps are enabled via the prctl() syscall.
Backport of a 2.x feature by Greg Ames.
Reviewed by:  Joe Orton, Jim Jagielski
